  <title>glwd_1</title>
  <abstract>Level 1 of the Global Lakes and Wetlands Database (GLWD) comprises the shoreline polygons of the largest lakes (area >= 50 square km) and reservoirs (storage capacity >= 0.5 cubic km) worldwide, including extensive attribute data.

GLWD-1 represents a global polygon map of large lakes to which existing lake registers, compilations or remote sensing data can be linked and georeferenced.

Supplemented by GLWD-2 and GLWD-3.</abstract>
